BindingObjUsageRsrcPlcy.name: BindingObjUsageRsrcPlcy
BindingObjUsageRsrcPlcy.description: Represents the policies that are used for the usage resource that's associated with an asset or a binding object.

BindingObjectId.description: The object that's bounded with the quote line policy or order policy.

DrawdownOrder.description: Specifies the order that's used to debit consumption of entitlements related to the usage resource from the usage entitlement bucket.

EffectiveEndDate.description: The date and time until when the policy remains effective.

EffectiveStartDate.description: The date and time when the policy becomes effective.

LastReferencedDate.description: The date when this record was last referenced.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

Name.description: The auto-generated identifier for the quote line item usage resource policy record. For example, BOURP-000004.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the owner of the binding object usage resource policy.

RatingFrequencyPolicyId.description: The rating frequency policy associated with the usage resource.

UsageAggregationPolicyId.description: The usage aggregation policy associated with the usage resource.

UsageCommitmentPolicyId.description: The usage commitment policy associated with the usage resource.

UsageOveragePolicyId.description: The usage overage policy associated with the usage resource.

UsageResourceId.description: The usage resource associated with the usage product.
